name: Flip Joy
description:
Welcome to our casual game! Get ready to challenge your brain. Here's how to play:

Gameplay: You will face a grid of 16 cards, all initially facing down.
Flip Cards: Choose any two cards to flip them over and remember their positions.
Match and Eliminate: If the two cards have the same pattern, they will be eliminated from the grid.
Clear the Grid: Your goal is to match and eliminate all the cards, clearing the entire grid.
Collect Rewards: Successfully completing levels unlocks desired CG rewards.

Enjoy this fun and engaging game while exercising your memory and focus. Are you ready for the challenge? Let's get started!
